location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.54 of 1825 (Political Department) to William Newnham, Chief Secretary, Government of Bombay, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

physicalDescription.extent: The letter has been struck through in blue pencil.

mods.abstract: The letter describes a peace deal brokered by the Imam of Muscat [Sa‘id bin Sulṭān al-Sa‘id] between the people of Macculla [Al-Mukallā] and Soor [Sur]. 7,000 dollars are to be paid by to the Shaikh of Al-Mukallā by the people of Sur, as compensation for their losses.
